      • recalculationRequired

        public boolean recalculationRequired()
        Recalculations are required if:
        • the time step was rescaled during this calculation
        • any module was interrupted during this calculation
        • the global error was larger than the recalculation cutoff
        Returns:
        true, if a recalculation is required

      • interruptAllBut

        public boolean interruptAllBut(java.lang.Thread callingThread,
                               UpdateModule callingModule)
        Returns true if the calling module was the first to call the method, therefore being allowed to optimize the time step.
        Parameters:
        callingThread - The calling thread.
        callingModule - The associated module.
        Returns:
        True if the calling module was the first to call the method.
